books.author: by Margot Lee Shetterly
books.description: he story, based in part on interviews, of the black women mathematicians who were hired as “computers” by the precursor of NASA during World War II. The basis of the movie.
books.name: HIDDEN FIGURES

books.author: by J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood in the Rust Belt.
books.name: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: by Bret Baier with Catherine Whitney
books.description: Eisenhower’s farewell address and his role in the Kennedy transition.
books.name: THREE DAYS IN JANUARY

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the final years of World War II.
books.name: KILLING THE RISING SUN

books.author: by Douglas Preston
books.description: A frightening search for a lost civilization in the Honduran rain forest.
books.name: THE LOST CITY OF THE MONKEY GOD

books.author: by Carrie Fisher
books.description: Recollections of life on the set of the first Star Wars movie by the actress and writer, who died in December.
books.name: THE PRINCESS DIARIST

books.author: by Chip Gaines and Joanna Gaines with Mark Dagostino
books.description: The couple who star in the HGTV show “Fixer Upper.”
books.name: THE MAGNOLIA STORY

books.author: by Carrie Fisher
books.description: A memoir based on Fisher’s one-woman autobiographical show. Originally published in 2008.
books.name: WISHFUL DRINKING

books.author: by Michael Lewis
books.description: How the psychologists Daniel Kahneman and Amos Tversky upended assumptions about the decision-making process and invented the field of behavioral economics.
books.name: THE UNDOING PROJECT

books.author: by Paul Kalanithi
books.description: A memoir by a physician who received a diagnosis of Stage IV lung cancer at the age of 36.
books.name: WHEN BREATH BECOMES AIR

books.author: by Debbie Reynolds and Dorian Hannaway
books.description: A second memoir by the actress, singer and dancer presents stories about her show-business friends, her man and money troubles, and her children.
books.name: UNSINKABLE

books.author: by Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the first Treasury secretary. Originally published in 2004 and the basis of the Broadway musical.
books.name: ALEXANDER HAMILTON

books.author: by Thomas L. Friedman
books.description: How the globalization, climate change and the accelerating pace of technology are reshaping the world, and what we can do about it.
books.name: THANK YOU FOR BEING LATE

books.author: by the Dalai Lama and Desmond Tutu with Douglas Abrams
books.description: A discussion between two spiritual leaders about how to find joy in the face of suffering.
books.name: THE BOOK OF JOY

books.author: by David M. Smick
books.description: A call for economic policies that will promote economic growth by encouraging Main Street capitalism (small businesses and start-ups) rather than Wall Street capitalism.
books.name: THE GREAT EQUALIZER
